activities: Rails Machine operates a hosting company that provides hosting, management, and support of customers around the globe.   Rails Machine houses and backs up customer data, but only collects personal information related to the individual customer's billing and technical contact information.   All other data is only stored on behalf of our customers, and only used during the performance of our hosting, management, and support of those customers.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: We only collect personal data related to the ownership, management, and technical contacts on the customer accounts.   We provide hosting, management, and support to customers using our services, which includes the storage of whatever data they may collect.  Our only interaction with that data is that which is necessary in the performance of our hosting, management, and support duties.
